author: cnbc.com
title: Sonic Foundry Announces Dates for its Second Earnings Call and Annual Shareholders Meeting
text:
MADISON, MADISON, Wis. — May 08, 2018 — Sonic Foundry, Inc. (NASDAQ: SOFO), the trusted global leader for video creation and management solutions, today announced it will release results of its fiscal year 2018 second quarter, which ended March 31, 2018, on Tuesday, May 15 after the close of the market, followed by its annual shareholders meeting on Thursday, May 17.
The company will host a corporate webcast for analysts and investors at 4:30 p.m. ET on May 15 discussing quarter results. Attendees can view the webcast either live or on demand via Mediasite . To access the webcast, please register at www.sonicfoundry.com/earnings on or before May 15, 2018. Viewers can participate in a Q&A session immediately following management’s prepared remarks.
The shareholders meeting at the Monona Terrace Community and Convention Center in Madison, Wis. will begin at 10 a.m. ET on May 17 and will also be streamed via Mediasite. To access the presentation, go to www.sonicfoundry.com/shareholders2018 . Sonic Foundry’s CEO Gary Weis, CFO Ken Minor and Chairman of the Board Mark Burish will be presenting.
A video archive of both presentations, including Q&A, will be available for 90 days.
About Sonic Foundry®, Inc.
Sonic Foundry (NASDAQ:SOFO) is the global leader for video capture, management and streaming solutions. Trusted by more than 4,700 educational institutions, corporations, health organizations and government entities in 65 countries, its Mediasite Video Platform quickly and cost-effectively automates the capture, management, delivery and search of live and on-demand streaming videos. Leading research firms Aragon, Forrester, Wainhouse and Frost & Sullivan recognize Sonic Foundry as a leader in enterprise video, webcasting and lecture capture. Learn more at www.sonicfoundry.com and @mediasite.
